Bash(git -C /Users/michael/Projects/Personal/catalogue commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
v0.5.0: Add AI-based item identification with Claude and Ollama

Add LLM-powered identification for items that don''t OCR well \(stylized
logos, hardware, Japanese text\). Supports Claude \(default\) and Ollama.

New CLI flags:
- --ai-identify: Use AI for all items
- --ai-fallback: Use AI when OCR fails to extract a title
- --ai-provider: Choose claude or ollama
- --ai-model: Override default model

New database columns: item_type, ai_description, ai_identified, brand,
region, year for richer item metadata.

Supports 10 item types: game, console, controller, accessory, peripheral,
book, vinyl, cd, trading_card, other.
